attributes.action: More mental health services for vulnerable adults.
attributes.additional_details: I have recently helped a vulnerable adult who had mental health issues and was in a very vulnerable state. There could have easily been a different outcome for this individual if it weren't for the help of the public to keep him safe until police and ambulance service arrived.
attributes.background: Put more funding into mental health services so individuals are supported effectively and don't reach crisis point.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions instead:

Fund more support for mental health: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300585

Create legislation requiring employers to have Mental Health First Aiders: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301940

More funding to ensure the safety of patients in the mental health system: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302995

Funded and sustainable mental health support networks for BAME communities: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326862
